unnormalised: Campus hiring season is crucial for talent acquisition. Our experience with IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad indicates immense potential. We're aiming for a start date of 01/07/2024 for new hires. Packages starting at Rs. 8 LPA. We held preliminary interviews on 10/05/2024 and expect final selections by 25/05/2024. Looking forward to onboarding fresh talent at 10:00 hrs! Need to analyze retention rates from last year's drive.
normalised: Campus hiring season is crucial for talent acquisition. Our experience with I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad indicates immense potential. We're aiming for a start date of first july two thousand and twenty four for new hires. Packages starting at rupee eight L P A. We held preliminary interviews on tenth may two thousand and twenty four and expect final selections by twenty fifth may two thousand and twenty four. Looking forward to onboarding fresh talent at ten zero zero hours! Need to analyze retention rates from last year's drive.
